cheatsheet.title: Create a connection to JasperReport Server

description.b: In this cheatsheet will be shown how to create a connection to a local installation of JasperReport Server, configured with the default parameter. This new connection can be used then to upload the local reports into the server.

item.title: Switch to repository explorer
item.description: From JasperSoft Studio go into the repository explorer.

item.title: Start the wizard
item.description: Right click on the node "Servers" and select "Create a JasperServer connection". A wizard dialog will appear.

item.title: Provide the access data
item.description: Leave the URL untouched and use as username and password "jasperadmin" and hit "Test Connection".

item.title: Complete the wizard
item.description: If the result of the test is successfull hit "Finish" to complete the wizard. You now will see the new server into the repository explorer
